name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru falls through a cherry blossom park scenery while shouting for help and thanking her fans.
Transition scene with a white fade to her 3D room.
Kobo gives a tour of her lighthouse room, showing her bed, her wooden horse, her collection of plushies, and her instruments.
Kobo performs the song 'Uta ni Katachi wa Nai Keredo' while playing the acoustic guitar.
scenes.song_name: Uta ni Katachi wa Nai Keredo

subtitles.original: Yagoo-san tasukete!
subtitles.english: Yagoo-san, help me!

subtitles.original: Ah! Thank you! Thank you for the...
subtitles.english: Ah! Thank you! Thank you for the...

subtitles.original: Thank you for this love! Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you for this love! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Nice!
subtitles.english: Nice!

subtitles.original: Okay, thank you!
subtitles.english: Okay, thank you!

subtitles.original: My back hurts...
subtitles.english: My back hurts...

subtitles.original: Akhirnya pulang juga ke rumah.
subtitles.english: Finally back home.

subtitles.original: Ah, untung pakai jas hujan.
subtitles.english: Ah, luckily I'm wearing a raincoat.

subtitles.original: Luckily, my outfit is waterproof.
subtitles.english: Luckily, my outfit is waterproof.

subtitles.original: Oh, by the way, welcome!
subtitles.english: Oh, by the way, welcome!

subtitles.original: Welcome to my lighthouse! ようこそ!
subtitles.english: Welcome to my lighthouse! Welcome!

subtitles.original: Ini dalamnya mercusuar aku. Ih, ih!
subtitles.english: This is the inside of my lighthouse. Hehe!

subtitles.original: Aku room tour dikit kali ya? Oke, let's go do a quick room tour, okay?
subtitles.english: Should I do a quick room tour? Okay, let's do a quick room tour, okay?

subtitles.original: Jadi di sini ada tangga karena mercusuar aku tuh tinggi banget sebenarnya.
subtitles.english: So here's a staircase because my lighthouse is actually really tall.

subtitles.original: Cuman ya, ya udahlah ya di lantai ini aja.
subtitles.english: But well, let's just stay on this floor for now.

subtitles.original: Nanti kita ke atas nanti-nanti aja, oke? Oke.
subtitles.english: We'll go upstairs later, okay? Okay.

subtitles.original: Lalu biasanya habis pulang sekolah aku langsung tidur. Langsung turu.
subtitles.english: And then usually after coming home from school I immediately sleep. Straight to sleep.

subtitles.original: Tapi ya karena aku buat tamu di sini jadi ya udah.
subtitles.english: But since I have guests here, I'll just...

subtitles.original: Aku room tour aja deh. Ya kan ya? Ya kan?
subtitles.english: ...do a room tour instead. Right? Right?

subtitles.original: Oh, ini namanya Oyamatadase.
subtitles.english: Oh, this is Oyamatadase.

subtitles.original: Iya kan? Lucu lucu lucu lucu lucu. Hup!
subtitles.english: Right? So cute, cute, cute, cute, cute. Hup!

subtitles.original: Oke, lanjut. Ee di sini biasa tempat lutingan-lutingan...
subtitles.english: Okay, moving on. This is usually where I loot...

subtitles.original: ...makanan-makanan diambil.
subtitles.english: ...where the food is taken.

subtitles.original: Terus ini kalau mau nyantai ya sama teman-teman yang biasa saya luting.
subtitles.english: And this is where I relax with the friends I usually loot.

subtitles.original: Nah, ada apa lagi ya? Ada boneka-boneka. Ini banyak boneka, sorry.
subtitles.english: Well, what else is there? Plushies. There are many plushies here, sorry.

subtitles.original: Terus ada... Nih ada Fajri, Kipli, Kupli, ya absen dulu yuk.
subtitles.english: And then there's... Here's Fajri, Kipli, Kupli, let's take attendance.

subtitles.original: Ya ada Rio, ada Rai, ada Ryu. Ya banyak banget ya guys.
subtitles.english: There's Rio, Rai, Ryu. There are so many of them, guys.

subtitles.original: Terus ada beberapa koleksi instrumen aku kayak salah satunya piano keyboard sih, keyboard.
subtitles.english: Then I have some instrument collections like one of them is a piano keyboard, well, a keyboard.

subtitles.original: Sama terus ada tempat aku biasa streaming di sini. Apa sih?
subtitles.english: And then there's the place where I usually stream. What is it?

subtitles.original: Ada... Ada monitor tadinya cuman...
subtitles.english: There was... a monitor earlier, but...

subtitles.original: Aku lagi pakai TV ya. Lagi nyantai dulu.
subtitles.english: I'm using a TV now. Just relaxing.

subtitles.original: Terus itu ah lihat ada ukulele. Ih!
subtitles.english: And then, oh look, there's a ukulele. Hehe!

subtitles.original: Sama terus ada kulkas sama ini ada dua instrumen yang sering aku mainin.
subtitles.english: And then there's a fridge and these two instruments that I often play.

subtitles.original: Yaitu gitar listrik sama gitar akustik.
subtitles.english: Namely an electric guitar and an acoustic guitar.

subtitles.original: Enggak sih, aku lebih sering main gitar akustik.
subtitles.english: No, I actually play the acoustic guitar more often.

subtitles.original: Nah yang tadi aku mainin tuh yang ini guys, yang gitar listrik.
subtitles.english: The one I played earlier was this one guys, the electric guitar.

subtitles.original: Jreng jreng jreng jreng jreng. Yeah.
subtitles.english: *strums* Yeah.

subtitles.original: Terus sama ada violin, ini jarang. Lagi jarang sih, ya.
subtitles.english: And then there's a violin, I rarely use it. Rarely for now, yeah.

subtitles.original: Sama nih ada tanaman ini. Hmm! Kantong semar.
subtitles.english: And then there's this plant. Hmm! A pitcher plant.

subtitles.original: Udah... Udah berkembang biak banyak banget deh.
subtitles.english: It's... it's grown so much.

subtitles.original: Hmm, ini oi.
subtitles.english: Hmm, so good.

subtitles.original: Oke. Ya kalian lihatlah apa lagi?
subtitles.english: Okay. Well, look what else is there?

subtitles.original: Itu tuh, langit-langit! Ah ah ah langit-langit.
subtitles.english: That, the ceiling! Ah ah ah the ceiling.

subtitles.original: Aku punya lampu-lampu lucu di atas. Wah!
subtitles.english: I have cute lights up there. Wow!

subtitles.original: Lucu ya lampu-lampunya.
subtitles.english: The lights are so cute.

subtitles.original: Terus emang kayak apa sih? Ceiling-nya lucu banget kan?
subtitles.english: And isn't it just...? The ceiling is so cute, right?

subtitles.original: Gimana gimana gimana cantik enggak kamar aku?
subtitles.english: How is it? Is my room pretty?

subtitles.original: Kayak pemiliknya. Iya enggak sih?
subtitles.english: Like the owner. Don't you think?

subtitles.original: Ya ya, aku tadi lihat, "Kak Kobo coba dong mainin instrumennya".
subtitles.english: Yeah, I saw earlier, "Kobo-kak, please play your instrument".

subtitles.original: Hah, shikata ga nai wa. Berhubung aku baik hati dan tidak sombong.
subtitles.english: *sigh* It can't be helped. Since I'm kind-hearted and humble.

subtitles.original: Untung aku enggak berisik.
subtitles.english: Luckily I'm not noisy.

subtitles.original: Enggak ya, aku baik. Aku lagi baik nih.
subtitles.english: No, I'm kind. I'm being nice now.

subtitles.original: Ya udah deh. Kalian dengerin ya, oke?
subtitles.english: Alright then. Listen up, okay?

subtitles.original: Chotto matte kudasai ne.
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment.

subtitles.original: Aku mau ambil itu, gitar. Ya deh aku main gitarnya aja deh.
subtitles.english: I want to take that, the guitar. Alright, I'll just play the guitar.

subtitles.original: Sama buka jaket bentar ya, oke? Tunggu di sini sebentar.
subtitles.english: And I'll take off my jacket for a bit, okay? Wait here for a second.

subtitles.original: Oke, nih aku turutin.
subtitles.english: Okay, I'm doing it.

subtitles.original: Request bocil-bocil Kobo main gitar nih.
subtitles.english: Fulfilling the request of Kobo's young fans to play the guitar.

subtitles.original: Hmm... Lagu yang mellow-mellow kali ya? Oke.
subtitles.english: Hmm... Maybe a mellow song? Okay.

subtitles.original: Lagu apa tuh kira-kira Kobo? Ya kalian pasti tahu.
subtitles.english: What song will it be, Kobo? Well, you guys definitely know.

subtitles.original: Nyanyi bareng ya yang tahu lagunya.
subtitles.english: Sing along if you know the song.

subtitles.original: Kita nge-galau bersama, oke? Oke.
subtitles.english: Let's be sad together, okay? Okay.
